text: Which of the following is an arithmetic progression (AP)? [SSC 2017]

The sum of first n terms of AP is given by: [SSC 2016]

If the first term is 10 and common difference is 0, then all terms are equal. [SSC 2019]

The 5th term of an AP is 23 and the 12th term is 37. Find a and d. [SSC 2019]
How many terms are there in AP 3, 7, 11, ..., 407? [SSC 2018]
The sum of first 7 terms of an AP is 140 and the 7th term is 30. Find a and d. [SSC 2020]
In an AP, 20th term is 10 more than the 10th term. Find d. [Predicted 2025]
The sum of first n odd numbers is n^2. Verify using AP method. [SSC 2021]
answer: Odd numbers form AP: 1,3,5,... with a=1,d=2. Sn=n/2[2a+(n-1)d]=n/2[2+2n-2]=n/2[2n]=n^2. Verified.

text: Ramesh saves Rs.50 in first week, Rs.60 in second week, Rs.70 in third week, and so on. Find his savings in 20 weeks and total saving. [SSC 2017]
